content.rendered:
Parkour Block 4 is a popular online parkour game where you jump across platforms to reach the exit. It’s a challenging game that requires quick reflexes and precise timing.

New speedrun mode! Skill game, classic mode from your favorite games right in the browser on your computer and phone! More levels, more mechanics and new hardcore mode await for you.

Here are some key features of Parkour Block 4:

  • Challenging levels: The game features a variety of levels, each with its own unique obstacles and challenges.
  • Multiple game modes: There are several game modes to choose from, including classic, speedrun, and hardcore.
  • Leaderboard: Compete against other players and try to achieve the best times.
  • Simple controls: The game is easy to learn, with intuitive controls.

Desktop: • SPACE – jump • WASD – move • L. SHIFT – running • Double Escape – Menu Mobile: • Touch
